name: Potato Soup
ingredients: 3 potatoes, peeled and cubed 1/2 tsp. salt
2 slices bacon, cook and crumbled 1/2 tsp. dried parsley
steps: Bring the water to a boil in a large pan. Peel, cut, and cube the potatoes. Peel and dice onion. Cook potatoes, onions, and
bouillon in the boiling water until soft. Mash 1/2 of the potatoes to enhance the flavor of the soup. In a separate bowl
add the flour and gradually add the milk and stir with a wire whisk to make a thin white sauce. Add the white sauce
and melted butter, salt and pepper, parsley, bacon and cheese to the potatoes and bring to a boil. The soup
will thicken as it boils. Serve immediately. Serves about 4 people.
